articles.title: Dr. Fauci: 'Unforced error' on AstraZeneca vaccine data may create doubt
articles.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci said an AstraZeneca news release may have contained misleading information about its Covid-19 vaccine efficacy — "an unforced error" that may create doubt about what is likely a good vaccine.
